Name: Project J
About the game: Hi there, this is my second game I've ever created. Come on the mysterious island and try to survive in this text based adventure Travel around the island, go mine, collect items and use them to craft armor, tools and much more. Fight against many monsters and try to beat the dangerous creatures who lives in the castle. FEATURES: - different bioms - changing weather and daytime - more than 70 items and 50 crafting recepies - health and hunger simulation - more than 20 monsters and animals Have fun!
